text:
Statement 1: Bayh Dole Act is a federal legislation of the United Kingdom. 

Statement 2: Bayh Dole Act permits universities to license their inventions for commercial development.

Statement 1: IP can be considered a tool to harness new technology
Statement 2: Universities are one of the means to dissemination of technology for wider distribution.

Statement 1: Publication kills novelty. 
Statement 2: 18 months is the maximum period within which a complete specification should be filed after filing of provisional specification for a patent.

Statement 1: Access to learning materials is one of the yardsticks used by NIRF to come up with the ranking.
Statement 2: NIRF stands for National Institute Ranking Framework.
Yodlee Inc was founded by which of the following Professor?
Which of the following are functions of IPM cell?
options: Educating staff and students about IP
Mediating between industry and the institute

text: Which agency assesses and accredits higher education institutions in India?

Madey v Duke University (2002) case relates to?

options: Limit disclosure to what technology can do.
Approach the TTO cell before disclosure.
